CodeBlockMethod.Name: OptDisOn
OptDisOff
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self._T.OD == nil then return end self._T.OD:Destroy() self._T.OD = nil

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local lucidside = self.Lucid.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX if lucidside == true then --맵을 떠날때 FlipX가 true가 되기때문에 update가 안되나 self:OptDisOff() else self:OptDisOn(_UserService.LocalPlayer.PlayerComponent.UserId) end
